metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20749 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibVNC before 0.9.12 contains a heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in libvncserver/rfbserver.c. The fix for CVE-2018-15127 was incomplete.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncserver-config - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
libvncserver0 - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
linuxvnc - 0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: italc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libvncserver package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.9+dfsg-1ubuntu1.4').
x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
